website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this headset is worth a look if you want great sound without spending a lot of money.
pros: Earns praise for being easy to set up and pair, and for emitting clear sound
Gets decent battery life per charge
Price falls on the lower end of the spectrum
cons: Doesn't provide a snug, comfortable fit for everyone, especially those with larger ears
A few reports of connectivity issues

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stand earbuds, I prefer the over the ear type. Since I have a Samsung S9+ sound has always been an issue. Sometimes it is difficult to adjust the plastic guard to a comfortable position behind the ear, but this is the most adjustable one I've had. Most are too bulky, this one is sleek. The sound quality is great and most people can’t even tell I’m on a Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: The Organic Millennial

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price and quality!!! Recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is incredible. The battery can easily last a whole day. The charging time is approximately the average. Bluetooth is easy to pair and quickly connect to my Samsung S9 plus. The Bluetooth is very good. In the range will follow me from one room to another. Otherwise, I have not experienced any fall, lag or stillness. Sound is not just acceptable but is good enough for me. Every day I find that these are more suitable for me. Very comfortable to my big ears :)
customer_reviews.author: Aroooyy

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised how clear the sound is!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bluetooth headset and I expected to have to talk loud and for the sound to be mediocre, at best. The sound is actually EXTREMELY clear both for myself and the person I am calling. I have asked several people I call and they have all said I sounded clear and easy to understand and that there was NOT a ton of background noise. It paired on the first try with my phone. I have a Samsung J7. Great headset. Im very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great BT headset
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent blue tooth headset. My grandson has been wanting one, so I decided to surprise him post-Christmas. He was happy that it came with different ear pads because he has a hard time getting a comfortable fit from a standard sized one. It connected easily with his phone. The sound is clear and the controls were easy for him to learn. Even the quality of the case to store it is durable and nice. He loves that you can use it in either ear, with smooth rotation to switch it around. Overall, he is very happy, therefore so am I. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Works well With  Kinks
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice earpiece. It is made well, comfortable and you can wear it for a long period of time without it irritating you. It connects easy with newer computers but my 5 year old computer would not pair at all. You can also pair with your phone easily. It understands voice commands but doesn't always accurately do what you say. For example if I tell it redial it is not always the last number I dialed that is called. There are a few bugs to work out but overall it is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues and no indicator of new call
customer_reviews.text: This as a gift for my husband to replace a different headset he had. This one had trouble connecting and switching back from phone to headset. He also missed several calls because unless he noticed his phone was ringing by seeing the screen then he didn't know he had a call. His old headset indicated to him when the phone was ringing and picked up easily without issues. He has an iPhone 10x. He is required to use the phone for work and be on call so he has already replaced this headset with a different one and no problems there. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blake

customer_reviews.title: Save your money & your privacy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 6 months and it's stopped working. It won't stay connected to my phone and drops off in the middle of calls. It also picks up EVERY background noise for the listener like it's right next to me. By clients could hear conversations of people IN THE OTHER ROOM. I couldn't even hear them that well. WILL NOT purchase again. Company contacted me & offered money to remove my negative post. VERY dishonest and unethical!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality worse than my crappy car bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The product description says it rejects environmental noise for the people you're talking to, but everyone said my audio quality was worse than my car's bluetooth, which is worse than the builtin mic in my phone. This was a waste of money and I didn't return it in time to get the refund because I was traveling. =|
customer_reviews.author: jacko

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound, I have to put laptop volume on high to get average volume. Rustling noises during some conference calls. Sometimes turns on and Sometimes not. I have to dial in to meetings earlier just in case they fail me, I have time to replace them. I have to charge it twice a day. Ended up throwing them away after the last rustling complain from my colleagues. This was after I spent 2 minutes trying to get it to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These is by far the absolute worst earpiece. Earpiece hovers on edge of ear it is so bad that the more you place inside the ear that due to its poor design the microphone pushes at about a 45 angle away fro your cheek. if you want to keep the mic close the your face then your stuck with a loos fitting ear piece, to get it somewhat snug i had to use my mpow earpiece gummie over this thing. i am already looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great heasdset for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking of a new bluetooth headset because my last one crapped out. I ended going with Icomtofit, the price was right. I have been using this for the last couple of weeks, let just say it is worth the money. Its conformable around the ear, very clear, great noise cancellation. comes in a nice carrying case, 6 different ear pieces to choose from, a usb charging cable, paired up easily with my LG V30 phone. I even listen to music and videos. The down side is the carrying case, you have to put it in exactly the way its molded, but other then that, Great bluetooth headset. Definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great earpiece! Very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my truck driver hubby and it's the best one he's ever used so far and, believe me, he has been through a few of them! He finds it very comfortable to wear as it is made from a soft-feel material. The sound is clear on both ends with good noise reduction. There was also a scratch card included in the box and we won a second earpiece which was received in the mail a few days later. That was really cool! Customer service was very responsive when I contacted them about winning and were very forthcoming with advice about using the earpiece. I would have no hesitation in recommending this very sleek and comfy to wear earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan R

customer_reviews.title: Low price low quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my work computer to make phone calls (I work in an office where I have to make around 100 a day) it was hard to use at first and only worked about half the time. I used it for two days and stopped because it wasn’t worth the hassle. I brought it out the other day to give it another try and the microphone won’t work at all. It would probably be ok to use to talk on a cell phone in the car or something but it did not work as a headset in an office environment and broke quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but just ok
customer_reviews.text: I've had Bluetooth headphones/ headsets since they came out close to 30 years ago, both cheap and expensive, but I always come back to Plantronics voyoger. It's pretty much the standard of what I judge others by. This Bluetooth is just ok, especially for the price. But since it's Lacks voice commands it makes it useless. A true Bluetooth in today's day and age has to have voice cammands for driving. So this is just used as a backup. Audio is good both incoming and outgoing. Battery life is good and wears well. It's just lacking good software. After having it for 3 weeks it stopped pairing. So went ahead and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth free......
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend it, the sound quality the people that call me Get is sad at best, and on my end it sounds like too much treble. Also the seller put a lotto card in the box to see if I could win another free earpiece and I won and I followed the directions to reach out for the earpiece and no one ever reply nor did I get the winning earpiece. I guess that’s a good thing seeing as I would have to throw both of them in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: This was a Black Friday purchase and I *thought* I was getting a great deal on a noise cancelling bluetooth headset. However, while the sound quality is great (too much as I'll explain) there is absolutely NO noise cancelling. Everyone I spoke to while using the headset complained that the background noise was excruciating. In one instance, I intentionally went in a very quiet room to take notes on the call and the caller asked me to stop the "loud scratching noise". The headset had magnified the noise from my pen scribble. Product is being returned for an exchange. I hope the next one will actually cancel the background noise so my callers can hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery, Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: These will literally come apart if you pull a little too hard to try and get it on your ear. The sound quality is not bad for phone conversations on my Cisco desk phone, but at times I can tell people have trouble hearing me. The battery life is about 1 hr of talk time so if you're on your phone more than that during the day you will be charging it. I bought it for conference calls and about half the time it goes low before the call is over. If the voice didn't say "battery low" every minute it wouldn't be that big of a deal, but once it gets to that point they are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: JaredL

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I had this product just over a month. I accidentally twisted the ear wrap the wrong way when trying to put it into the case. It snapped with the slightest pressure. Since it was my own fault, I am rating a 2 instead of a 1. But these are cheaply made IMO. Sounds was ok. I really liked that it connected to my phone and computer at the same time. This was the best part of these. The battery life wasn’t great. I am on phone calls 75% of the day and this would last about 90 mins and need recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability and poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE Contacted the company about the defective problem. They sent another replacement. Product also did not last no more than a month before it fell apart again. Company offered bribe of $100 to remove review. Purchased 01/16/2019. Product failed 03/02/2019. Poor durability, weak speaker, poor quality. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lewbert

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile. Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and receivers say microphone is sharp and clear. Yet dropped it from counter top. Broke easily. Wrote the same in a review. Company offered me a brid to remove my bad review and offered $80 to remove. So I gave them a chance and removed review. But never saw the $80. Hope you consider a less fragile earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So convenient, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and makes it possible to safely make calls hands free while driving, cooking, etc. The case on my phone makes it hard for people to hear me unless the microphone is close to my face, so I couldn’t make calls in the car without holding the phone. Now I can make calls and use the buttons to easily adjust volume, mute, or redial my last call without touching the phone. Sound quality is great, even with loud street noise. I’ve left it in the car for 3 days without a charge as long as I turn it on and off. Where has this been all my life?! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Taylor Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and efficient. Only Bluetooth worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: I work at a call center and at the moment I'll be working from home. The company provided us some headsets but are not Bluetooth. Just standard cable headsets. After purchasing this Bluetooth headset, my job has been amazingly easier. No more cables and the audio quality is amazing. The battery life is fair for what I use it for and the comfort is great. I don't have a sore ear after a long 10-11 hr shift. Only thing I wish is that you can charge the headset within the case instead of having to take the whole thing out but other then that I would definitely recommend! Also they have a fun giveaway after your purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Ivan_OG

customer_reviews.title: decent cheaper headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset to use while working from home and being on conf calls. Battery life appears to be good, and I haven't gotten any complaints on my voice quality, but people can hear stuff in the background, so I don't think the noise canceling portion of the headset is very effective. It doesn't inspire alot of confidence the first time you use this headset that the electronic voice that says 'connected' is like static and breaks up a bit. If I have the headset out of my ear, or if I have to readjust its position, there are some buttons that are easy to accidentally hit, but on a small headset that is probably always true.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great earpiece so far, for the price. I have a loud work truck that interferes with calls to my customers /personal calls, and it has caused a lot of frustration in the past. I haven't had this for that long yet, but so far so good. The noise canceling function is great. It totally drowns out the air /exhaust, while I'm driving. I can hear really well also. At times it sounds a little muddled, but I can't tell what end the issue is coming in from. The battery life is outstanding.. I used it off and on throughout a ten hour shift with no issues at all. I would Def recommend this to someone
customer_reviews.author: kyle trombley

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this headset.
customer_reviews.text: It's... Okay. That's what you're buying an okay early 2000s looking Bluetooth headset. The over the ear piece didn't fit my wife's smaller ears. The loop is too tall and completely misses her ear and falls out. I'm keeping it as a backup in my office mainly because I don't think I can return it. I would find another Bluetooth. I've had a few jawbone ones and trying this one out really feels like a huge step backward in audio quality and feel in and on the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased headset because of reviews and ranking on Amazon. Not disappointed. Previous headsets cost twice as much and this one is way better in every aspect. Noise cancelling and quality of sound is great that even our clients have commented on the improvement. Can't beat it for the price. We also won a free headset as a promotional item. Win Win for us, as I was going to order a second one. Customer support is great and personable. The free headset was shipped within 12 hours of notifying them and received the next business day. Looking forward to trying out the voice commands for hands free calling.
customer_reviews.author: MomsOnBreak

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this headset. I was a bit skeptical and spent hours researching trying to find the best product. Due to the times we find ourselves in I’ve been lucky enough to work from home and I needed something guaranteed and will give me the quality my company expects. It does all of that. My voice is crystal clear it does pick up the tv sound from time to time. I’m on the phone for 9 hours a day in between meetings and it made it half way through charged it for 30 min and it lasted the rest of the day. Honestly genuinely happy with the product and set up was incredibly easy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hey there

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered well known brand first but the headset was so heavy that I had to return it. Then I came across this one, less expensive and so far it fits better, is more comfortable and works well. I keep switching the ear throughout the day and that helps too. Some callers still say that they can hear background noice (I have a loud birds that I was trying to block from my phone conversations), but this is so comfortable and easy to use, I will keep it and order one for my husband too. Battery life is long and the radius is ok. So, great overall product. I do recommend this product. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with a price you can't beat
customer_reviews.text: I tried this Bluetooth Headset after testing at least 3 other ones. By far this is the best product not only in sound quality, battery life, and noise cancellation but also overall ease of use. I was up and running in minutes after I paired with my iPhone. My colleagues couldn't believe it - they said I sounded "crystal clear", so much so they thought I was literally sitting next to them even though I was in another country. I have tried several other headsets, most of them much more expensive than this one. Without a doubt, you can't find a better headset for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Will Wait and See
customer_reviews.text: Just received this Bluetooth. Had to return the first one as it was inoperable. Wouldn’t turn on at all. Now I received “first prize” for a free Bluetooth and was told i had to write a review first in order to receive the free prize. Having only used it for 2 days, I hope it continues to work. So far it is a good device. We will see how long it lasts. Can I have my first prize now?
customer_reviews.author: C. Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Tinny sound quality - returning this phone
customer_reviews.text: Sound is tinny - not a high quality product - and you have to strain to hear. I ordered this phone because my Plantronics 50 needed to be replaced but I couldn’t find it on Amazon (I think it was temporarily sold out), so I ordered this one instead. Very disappointed and returning. Sound quality is poor whereas the Plantronics that I’ve had for years is crystal clear and you wouldn’t even know you were on a mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: William I.

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have a lot of faith in these being a very good bluetooth headset coming from Plantronics. I have to say I'm glad I took a leap. I have been using these while driving a commercial vehicle, in the wind, home, ect. I have only received one person that mentioned I sounded far away, but I think it was the way I had set the boom. Where this is my one negative I'm having a tough time keeping the speaker in my ear. I have tried various other earbuds I have from other headset in the past... Bottom Line well worth the price, I use these as my daily driver and plantronics as a bad up.
customer_reviews.author: Zuko

customer_reviews.title: Survived the Wash
customer_reviews.text: it survived the wash, that deserves 5 stars. it was powered down at the time but still. infact, not the 1st device that made it into the wash or pool as it were but the 1st to survive being fully submersed. as for the my overall impression: not the most attractive, discrete or comfortable i've owned. that said, it does fit securely, has decent range, average or better battery life and the sound quality is on par with past units (2 voyager edge's, dont recall others). so, for $30 it does the job and the fact it survived 1.5hr wash cycle makes it a good by in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch device compared to the previous device
customer_reviews.text: This is an update from a previous review. The device pictured is not the one I'm reviewing. I received a newer model that was 10 X better than the one pictured. It's crystal clear and it fits very well around the ear. The battery life is phenomenal!! The only issue is the listening of music through the device that's horrible! However, the speaking and listening is top notch! Plus, for the price you can't beat it. They're ok... Not very comfortable at all. It simply doesn't fit snug in the ear. Plus, the only way to re-pair the unit is by plugging it back in and then factory resetting the device. I wouldn't buy it again nor recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andre walton

customer_reviews.title: If I could just remember where I put it last!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear. Sound is good. Fits either ear (once you figure out how to swap the ear holder thing). Keeps me hands free and legally compliant while driving. One thing, the buttons are sensitive and sometimes I inadvertently bump it and my itunes music will start playing. I've not stopped to figure this out yet. Also haven't mastered how to gauge the battery life. The British voice reminder of "Battery Low" is helpful and you best be finding that plug soon! Other than that I like it. Get one for your car and a second one for home .... or for when you can't find the first one,' cuz you know it's gonna happen :)
customer_reviews.author: SunnyD

customer_reviews.title: High quality inexpensive headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset after hearing how harsh and mechanical I sounded when participating in a webinar with a wired Apple EarBud headset. I use this for Zoom calls on my computer and iPhone calls and it's much more natural. Headset is easy to use and configure and stays on my ear through normal activities like walking and moving around. I use it more and more for listening to books an Audible. Really can't tell on echo cancellation because the seal with my ear isn't that tight. Works fine around most ambient noise. Nice inexpensive unit so if it gets lost or stepped on I can just buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ozer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible audio
customer_reviews.text: I don't get these overwhelmingly positive reviews, this product is built and sounds cheap. Audio is "tinny" at best and the build is balanced wrong - all weight is in the armature rather than on the ear. It flops around a lot. Made a few calls and my voice was stated to be "fine" but with a "canned" sound; what I got in my ear was awful. No low end, all treble. Like listening to a poorly tuned radio broadcast with the static filtered out. Invest and get a known brand, all I did here was waste time which is often more precious than money, at least to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. McDannold

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset works and sounds good. The sound quality is good for both hearing and talking. I like the fact that it has a separate mute button. There are only two things that I would improve. I wish that it had a way to tell the status of the battery (i.e. how much time is left). The other thing is the ear covers that were included didn't fit my ear well. My ear would start to hurt after long conversations (over 2 hours). I ended up using another ear cover from one of my other earbuds and it works great. I would definitely buy these again and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jody S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a more economical alternative to Plantronics, sorry, I meant Poly. To the user the headset may seem comparable in many ways. However if you are the person on the other end of the call there is no discernible noise cancellation and nearly every sound from the background is heard. If the sound is loud enough it can overwhelm your conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Tim - Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is stated at eight hours, only getting about five and a half under heavy use. Also the fit to the ear is not quite right, if the ear piece could drop down another 1/8 of an inch or so it would be more comfortable for me.Instructions with the packaging could be written better. Now for the good stuff, once you get it paired up sound is clear and precise, noise cancellation is great! And if you have questions, just send off an email to the customer service department you get a reply within 24 hours with suggestions to fix and or help with any problem you have. Yes I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Verne A. Amundson

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for work
customer_reviews.text: If you were using your built in laptop mic and speakers for conference calls, stop. Pick this headset up. Pros: Battery life, comfort, connection, Cortana integration Cons: Sound is a bit on the high end (very low bass) I haven't tried to pair this to my iphone yet while paired to the laptop. I can easily understand why the voice assistant wouldn't work well when you do that. How could it know which one you want? Regardless, not a problem if you don't depend on them. Summary: great purchase and I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bluetooth is very lightweight, you'll forget it's there. It's durable, flexible and can accommodate either side of your face. Con: I only have one issue, it wiggles a little, may be a ''user error''. I've tried alomost all of the earbud covers, but with each one, it still wiggles. Still a great buy! I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: For The Art In You, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product (lost the first one). So it is obvious that the headset works to my satisfaction ++. I have owned other very similar units from a well known brand. I find the Icomtofit unit works as well or better. I seem to have fewer connection issues than I the others. The range also seems better. There are several features that I have yet to try but I expect them to be consistent with the very good performance of the basic call functions, if I can just avoid losing it. Perhaps they can add a liss prevention feature. :)
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need in a headset
customer_reviews.text: I've used the headset for a week and so far have not had to charge it since the initial charge. It does everything you would expect - connects to my two phones quickly, transfers music, and is comfortable. The thicker over-the-ear raises my sunglasses up a little, but when driving, neither I or anyone else will notice. The only thing I wish it had, and other headphones do, is announce the model of the phone its paired to when it connects. I have 2 phones connected and if one doesn't connect, I'll not know which one I have to look at to investigate. Not a big enough issue to mark down a star.
customer_reviews.author: D_Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as I'd hopped. The charge only last for a few hours so I had to keep turning it off when I wasn't using it. I lost the ear part after about a month and a half. I couldn't believe it had fallen off. I do not recommend this item. I should have went ahead and got the Plantronics. I have used their products both for work and personally and hadn't been disappointed. This was cheaper. The saying is true, "You get what you paid for".
customer_reviews.author: Divy

customer_reviews.title: Not 8 to 10 hours talk time as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Ok soooo , I like that it is loud and I can clearly hear the voice on the other end of my calls without having to go full volume like other Bluetooth headsets I have used. Buuuuut , the battery life isn't as good as claimed. I'm lucky to get 4 hours of talk time . Description says 8 to 10 hours of talk time. The other thing I didn't like was that it picked up the background noise on other end really well, which at times would hurt my ear and I have to tell person to stop doing what they're doing ,like cooking for example so as my hearing would not be affected
customer_reviews.author: Mr Opinion

customer_reviews.title: It is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Well to start with it falls off your ear. Unless you have ears the size of Dumbo the Elephant it won't stay on your ear. You are constantly picking it off the floor or ground. Last week it decided to just not work, it was useless to start with but now nothing works. DON'T BUY THIS JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Nichalo-Nichalo

customer_reviews.title: Really liking this product
customer_reviews.text: I had to have an over the ear with an integrated ear hook. The little plastic ear loops were always breaking when it put them in my pocket. This unit is very sturdy and it folds nicely to fit in your pocket without breaking something. I've had no issues connecting to my iphone 8 plus. I'm use this product heavily as I work from home and listen to a lot of podcasts. The battery life is normal. I need to charge it every other day but that's getting like 8 hours of use. I would highly recommend this unit if you have similar needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEADSET EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best headset ever. I am a truck driver I can leave my phone in the truck and walk away 50 feet and I'm still able to receive calls with my my phone on the truck. You can use it on left or right ear has multiple earbuds sizes for your ear size. Its battery lasts easily 2 complete days using it pretty much the hole day. It is very comfortable I rarely feel I have something on my ear not like other headsets that after a while your ear starts to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Best Blue Tooth I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most logically setup for controls I have had in a decade. If you need a new set then go for this the price is right the seller gives fast reply to questions and good advise. The battery is a quick charge and has a very long talk time as I am one the phone constantly thru out the day and evening. The features such as noise canceling work as I often have the drivers window open and there is no pick of wind or traffic noise. I have found this unit so good I have talked my wife into getting one for her Galaxy S10 .
customer_reviews.author: David F Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good "inexpensive" Headset
customer_reviews.text: Good overall Bluetooth headset Pros: 1-Comfortable to wear (extremely light weight) 2- callers say that they hear my voice very clearly 3- good Bluetooth range Cons: 1- the ear piece tends to amplify the hight frequencies making the sound I hear through it very tinny 2- the battery charge indicator goes from 100% to flashing empty charge in one step. You don't actually know how much charge your headset has while using it. I was on a conference call and saw that I had 100% of charge left, but then it went to empty and turned off abruptly. In my experience, the battery allows for 4-5 hours of talk time not the 8 that's advertised
customer_reviews.author: AMMAR KATTAN

customer_reviews.title: Very good blue tooth but beware if you plan to use it with two phones.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this blue tooth, light and sounds very good but... I have this unit connected to two iPhones. The problem is when I disconnect from a call from my work phone, music begins to play from my personal phone through the blue tooth. I was not playing music before the call. Never had an issue with my Plantronics unit. I bought this unit as a backup. ***Update*** After contacting customer service at the seller, they were very responsive and tried ti help. Unfortunately there was no solution.
customer_reviews.author: George...

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned this as I couldn't answer the phone most of the time. Maybe I was doing it wrong but I would tap as instructed and many times music would play and then I had a hard time shutting it off. I had to go find my phone to answer calls or I missed the calls. I watched you tube videos to try and get this right. Siri is a plus. I felt the part that wraps around your ear is a bit thick. I ended up going back to the BT I have that answers calls easily. Doesn't have all the bells and whistles but works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha S

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality & volume was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an aging Plantronics headset in which the battery was dying. My most important criteria is sound quality and volume, and this excelled at both. The headset is a bit larger than others I've used, but not an issue. I did however have an issue with it sitting in my ear correctly ... properly seated, the arm would stick outwards a bit too much. You'd expect me to give this about 4 stars then, but I contacted the seller and they responded *very* quickly and did not hesitate to instantly offer a refund, without question. I'm in awe over customer service like this, especially today. So 6 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Neil the real deal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I could find a headset for work that would actually work! Every other headset that I've tried has some kind of problem or something wrong with it. Whether it's call quality, build quality, or battery life. But this product hits all the right notes. It has the best call quality out of everything I've tried. The build quality and durability is great. And the battery life last for an entire day of work. I wasn't sure I wanted to take a chance on this headset, but I'm really glad I did. I would definitely get again if I needed to!
customer_reviews.author: ERICK H.

customer_reviews.title: I've tried a lot of Bluetooth devices but this is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of Bluetooth devices for phone calls. I don't need music, just good clear voices. These are perfect! Noise cancellation isn't total, but everyone tells me the background noise is minimal. The buttons for muting, volume, on/off are easily accessible. Works for either ear, which for a lefty like me, is a big deal. I've listened to my audible books with it and it's perfect. I don't like something in both ears so I can hear around me. These do that perfectly. And the price made them even better!!
customer_reviews.author: aschaech

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year, super-heated and LED stopped during charge
customer_reviews.text: Loved the small form factor and sound quality of it. The ear loop loosened up and became floppy, but still usable. I used it nearly daily for over a year until today. When I plugged it in to charge it (using the same charger as always), no LED indicators came on and the unit super-heated until it was too hot to touch under the main play/pause button. It still works, but I don't want a faulty battery that close to my head. Now I'm afraid to use it and am replacing it with another type. Engineered obsolescence? Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Harston

customer_reviews.title: Great battery! Excellent sound and voice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was offered this headset to try after purchasing the "Bluetooth Headset, COMEXION Wireless Business Earpiece V4.1 Lightweight Noisy Suppression Bluetooth Earphone with Microphone for Phone/Laptop/Car." Both are fantastic products in a highly affordable price range. This headset has some slight differences. Over all it is just slightly larger, the sound quality is wonderful and I am told that I can be heard crystal clear when on a call. The battery life on this headset seems to be better than the afore mentioned headset. My only complaint is that the ear hook does not swivel outward easily as the other headset does. This is probably more personal preference than a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality! Wish it was a little more durable.
customer_reviews.text: I really, REALLY like the quality of this Bluetooth! But it’s only getting four stars because of its durability. There was a little plastic piece that broke off very shortly after getting it, although it seemed more for decoration and I wasn’t too worried. But if it gets dropped or moved around too much, it can pop open. It’s very lightweight and plastic, which is nice, but also doesn’t feel as sturdy as I’d like. The over-the-ear piece is nice and holds in place very well, and again - best sound quality I’ve had in a LONG time!! (Both from my side and from the other caller’s perspective - I’ve asked.)
customer_reviews.author: Leah D

customer_reviews.title: If not directly in line with phone,  connection is bad.
customer_reviews.text: If not directly in line with phone, connection is bad. For instance, my phone was in my right pocket, and I had the headset on my left ear. The connection would vary between poor and no connection at all. I gave 3 stars overall because it fits well and does not have this connection issue every time, maybe 40% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: A. N.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love! Great for sensitive ears
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ear piece! I have very sensitive ears and can’t seem to wear ear pieces of any sorts. I have tried many diff types trying to find something that would work for me. I have tried buds, pods and many types of phone specific ones. This is it. This is the winner. It doesn’t hurt my ears, I don’t even realize it’s there. It did take me some getting use to. But now I forget about it. It’s easy to use, clear and like I said...comfortable!!! I recommend this for anyone that wants something like this but just can’t seem to wear anything in their ear.
customer_reviews.author: nleggett1

customer_reviews.title: Low-quality, not that cheap
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit well, and I don't usually have fit issues. The sound quality was poor, and the quality of the item did not seem very good. The packaging and instructions were also sub-par. Definitely not worth the money. EDIT: this was initially a 2-star review, but I lowered it to 1-star, because they are repeatedly e-mailing me and offering me MONEY TO TAKE DOWN THE REVIEW. STOP E-MAILING ME. I've gotten two e-mails today already. This is why Amazon has such great reviews on such terrible products. PLEASE FIX THIS, AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_C

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Headset
customer_reviews.text: + Good battery life + Good noise cancellation (far side cannot hear your background noise) + Standard USB charger (non-proprietary) + Nice carrying case - Can sound a little "tinny", almost no bass - Wish it told you battery status when you first turned it on (some headsets do this) - Can be temperamental when trying you get it to sync to more than one device. Often I will have to manually connect to it from my laptop's Bluetooth settings, or toggle Bluetooth off and on from my phone. Just giving a full review of what I noticed. Overall an amazing headset at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gradin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother for Christmas in 2019 he's a truck driver as well as a new dad so it was the perfect gift they work very well. Its June 2020 and they still are working great I see him using them everyday, to work out, run errands, sit down and take a break, doesnt want to miss a call from work or reguarding his baby boy. He was so happy when he had a scratch off and won another set. I emailed the seller to claim the gift. I was contacted back right away with no run around. Great product, great costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki💕

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Bluetooth headset to use in my office, and must say this covers all my needs. Pairing was very easy on iPhone, call quality is great, and sound is surprisingly very good even when I tried listen to music. This one comes with several tips you can change to find your fit. This is were my only small complain would come, as I can't seem to find a fit where I am perfectly satisfied. Not a big issue, and it could be just me, most importantly, it does what I needed it to do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vidis

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Bloothtooth
customer_reviews.text: We just received this bluetooth, it is clear conversation and fits snug behind the ear. Most people don't know that they install the bluetooth start at the front of the ear for it to fit properly. This bluetooth has extra length so it fits better in the ear and behind the ear. We will keep you posted on the battery life after charging and how long this bluetooth works after several wears and how long a charge last on the bluetooth. It's to new to answer any questions about functionality and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluetooth I’ve ever had and I’ve had a lot of them! I was very excited when I put this one on and it was very comfortable! I received a giveaway “scratch off” and won the first place prize for another Bluetooth....FREE!!! I followed the instructions on the scratch off and sent them a email and they responded super fast and shipped me my free Bluetooth within a couple days! I HIGHLY recommend this item. The sound is clear, it holds a charge for long periods of time, it’s just a very reliable product! Stop wasting your time searching for anything other then this Bluetooth! ...very satisfied customer here:)
customer_reviews.author: sherri holland

customer_reviews.title: Good buy at first.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good quality. Love the play/pause function on the headset. Its a little bit bigger than what i expected but its not a deal breaker. Much better than that bee bluetooth thing that has thousands of reviews. I bought that and returned it. Update: I returned it. The sound quality is good and the battery is good but i hurts so much to wear it. 20 min and my ear is already painful. If i cant wear it then its useless. Its not for people with smaller ears. Its big and impossible to wear for longer than 20min.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula434343

customer_reviews.title: it serves its purchase
customer_reviews.text: Recently made this purchase. I've always used a higher end brand but kept breaking the rubber ear piece off. I was looking for on with a case and wanted to spend less. The product works fine. I have to connect manually every time I turn it on and sometimes its a little stubborn connecting, but otherwise it does it job without all the bells and whistles. so if your looking for an inexpensive ear piece, this one fits the bill. I think i would spend more on my next one because I do miss some of the extra's
customer_reviews.author: Johnny J

customer_reviews.title: Great little headset!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for use in my car since it was difficult for people to hear me over the car noise. Works great! My only two complaints are: 1) I have smaller ears (2.25") and it's tough for me to keep this on without jamming/attempting to suction the earbud into my ear. It's adjustable for larger ears but not adjustable for smaller unfortunately. 2) It says in the instructions the volume+ button goes to the next song and the volume- button goes to the previous song, but mine's opposite (so the volume- button goes to the next song and vice versa). It's just going to take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Britney L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: My car Bluetooth is brutal which is why I purchased this unit. Had great reviews and was very reasonably priced. Have to say it is a solid purchase and I am glad I chose this one. They had a drawing and I won another unit free of charge. Their customer service is exceptional and I will be glad to do business with them again. Well worth the money as it is a great product through and through.
customer_reviews.author: TPM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for $40, but I am pleasantly surprised how well this very light Bluetooth earpiece works. The fit is good and I'm able to click one button and ask google to do many things on my Pixel 2 phone while my phone is in my pocket (instructions show iphone only but glad to report works great on Android). Button placements are good. Battery life seems good, haven't had any issues, charging is quick. I haven't used Bluetooth in awhile because quality of $100+ products seemed not good. They have improved and this product delivers!
customer_reviews.author: NWPerson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound from Earpiece and through Mic
customer_reviews.text: I will be teaching entirely online in the Fall, and I wanted a good, small earpiece and microphone for doing online videoconferences and recording. This is not the product I was hoping for. The in-the-ear sound is tinny and distorted, and recordings using the microphone are muffled and unclear. Really useless for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: HalloweenHJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding Bluetooth earpiece!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset. When I purchased this, it came with a carry case, and 6 replacement ear rubbers in different sizes. The ear hook is adjustable in 3 ways and fits securely. Its not noticed when wearing and the sound quality is great. The connection to my phone was easy. I keep it connected to two phones at work as I do tech support and need to be able to work hands free. The earpiece is definitely a keeper, and I plan on getting one for my wife. Good sound, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Verbal

customer_reviews.title: Design makes it worthless
customer_reviews.text: The power button can be difficult to use making it hard to turn on. By putting it on the outside of the device, users have to push the device into the ear or squeeze it (difficult to do when wearing) but in a shirt pocket, it can turn on at any time. this makes it hard to turn on on purpose and easy to turn on accidentally. You have to carry the case around which I'm not interested in keeping another think in my pocket. Not comfortable as others I've used and not practical.
customer_reviews.author: George Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Kind on the ear!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many bluetooth devices some very expensive and some just outright cheap. They ALL hurt my ear and then here comes this one. EVERYTHING about it is perfect!! Very comfortable, clear sounding and even with my car windows down, people can hear me just fine. Another added benefit is that it announces the phone number of the caller before the phone actually starts to ring!! Talk about a safety feature!?! I highly recommend!! And then it came with a scratch off and I won a second one all for me!! This one is too good to share. At such a reasonable price, everyone can buy their own. Get it!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: #OnlyOnceYouLive

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable headset and easy to use. Bluetooth coverage is excellent, I can walk all over my house with no drops. The sound quality is very good, some of my friends didn't know I was on the headset. I would recommend this product to everyone looking for a great headset. UPDATE: I have had this ICOMTOFIT Bluetooth Headset now for a few weeks and still have had no issues or complaints about the sound. I got my wife one too and we talked lasts night and she sounded so clear and clean like she was next to me. I highly recommend this headset!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: I have owned some expensive headsets and one I washed and it never really worked well again. One of them I lost. I got sick of spending over $100 for headsets and losing them. I saw these and the price was right but I was concerned about how well they would work. So far I have been very pleased with them. And I washed them. I figured they were ruined but to my surprise they still work just fine. I can’t really tell any difference between these and the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: I work remote and had a terrible headset. I prefer the single ear style, and this stays on (doesn't wiggle or need adjustment) and the person on the other end hears your perfectly, and you hear them perfectly. Pretty good distance away from phone to stay connected, too. Press button once to answer a call, once to hang up. When not on phone, press the button and my Pandora streams and press button to stop music. Love it! Great quality for the price! At the office, I have a very expensive ($200+) headset that isn't nearly as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with USB BT adapters...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on everything that I don't plan on using it for, but doesn't work on what I bought it for of course... If your computer has an Intel built in BT card it will work fine, but if you have a USB BT adapter, only the sound will work... I've tried 3 different BT USB adapters and messed with the drivers for both devices and just could not get it to work at all. I planned on using this for skype but now it just works a wireless earbud... not what I bought this for. I would Like to return it but sadly I lost the box already, only have the plastic case, ear pieces, and the earbud itself...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Headset met my expectations based on product description and related buyer reviews. Seller sent a follow up message along with a more comprehensive digital manual to assure satisfaction. Extremely easy to set up and very nice features. The carrying case and additional ear bud pieces are a very nice and appreciated bonus.
customer_reviews.author: edf@amazon

customer_reviews.title: Are You in an Echo Chamber?
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is absolutely garbage. Everytime I am talking to someone on the phone with this they cannot hear me. I have had remarks such as: "Take those marbles out of your mouth!" "Are you in a bathroom with the water running?" "Are you in an echo chamber?" The list of what people say goes on and on. I record all of my calls and you can hear EVERYTHING in the background. I hear paper shuffling, mouse clicks, water running. There is virtually no noise cancellation that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns my frown upside-down!
customer_reviews.text: I'm as happy as can be with this headset. I'm not the most technically savvy person on the earth, so it took me a little while to figure out how to set it up. Now that I have it paired to my little MP3 player, it works like a charm. I bought it to brighten my day at work. I pop this little earbud in, play my happy tunes, and it instantly makes my day better. I find this headset to be comfortable, sturdy, and totally silent to my coworkers. I can listen to any kind of weird music and nobody has any idea.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: After having to get in touch with the manufacturer, they backed the product. When I sent an email, I got a response within a couple of hours. They volunteered to refund my money. When I asked if I could just get a new unit - DONE. I got it within a week. I fully charged it the afternoon/evening I got it. That was several days ago. It's still charged and working. The Icomtofit G3 is a good product that they stand behind.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: The description says it is a noise cancelling headset. I just got it, charged it, and used it at work. The person I was talking to on the phone could hear my coworker talking in the background. My coworker was talking in a normal voice on a different phone and was sitting 15 feet away from me. I then tried shuffling some papers. The person I was talking to could hear every noise in the background. So no, not noise cancelling AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: WestTXisGr8

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It turns on and connects quick enough to answer a phone call, that’s nice because you don’t have to leave it in standby mode. However, battery seems to last several hours even in standby mode. I left it on all day. Simple to use, sound quality pretty good, people say sound quality on the other end is good. Only thing I’m not in love with is fitment; they send 4 different ear pieces but even with on that fits in ear fairly well, it doesn’t feel overly secure. Useable, not a huge deal, but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: hoodedmergeezer

customer_reviews.title: Sound comes thru loud and clear and the battery is the energizer bunny
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with how well the sound comes through. I actually have to turn down the volume because I'm hearing everything that's going on around the person I'm speaking to. I only use the headset in spurts throughout the day so of course I expected to not charge it at least for a few days... It took a few WEEKS for me to run the battery down. On a recent call, the sound cut out often thru the conversation and I had to ask them to repeat every time. I don't know if it was their phone or mine or just the headset but that is the first time I've had any trouble. I'm hoping it was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so far
customer_reviews.text: I just got this hands free and so far it worked great. instructions was easy to fallow and it was easy to connect it to my phone. After about a week using the product I am still satisfied with it. A cool thing about it is that I can listen to my iPhone songs by clicking 1 button and I am surprised that it held the charge for several hours of listening to songs and answering calls. Also there might be a giveaway in the box as well! Thumbs up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nimgol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth device
customer_reviews.text: Arrived prior to expected date and packaged very nicely. It is one of the best Bluetooth headsets I've used as far as sound quality, noise cancelation, and battery life. Use of distance from the phone is about the same as others - @ 33 ft. It is much larger than I normally use but I knew that before I purchased it. I have only had it a week but it has done exceptionally well. My mom HATES when I talk to her using a bluetooth because of the noise but she has had NO complaints when I use this one. She can't even tell I am using one! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Zero noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Headset was comfortable, easy to setup. Battery life was really good. Sound quality through my laptop and PC both was very poor, scratchy/whiny noise appeared on calls about 1-2 minutes in. However when used with my iPhone it was much better. Sound was good on both ends. Biggest issue here is there is zero noise cancellation no matter the platform. It picks up every single sound and conversation around you. No way you could use this in an office or anywhere that is heavily trafficked or for work calls. Had to return because of it, could not use it as a spare for work calls.
customer_reviews.author: ANJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quailty and battery lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand of bluetooth and it kept disconnecting and reconnecting and sometimes couldn't even get it connected. I read numerous reviews on this bluetooth and decided to give it a try. Overall great bluetooth. Battery has lasted all day while talking to customers and haven't had anyone complain about the sound. It takes a little time to get adjusted to the size in my ear, however, once I played around with the different cushions they give you I got the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Completes my Work from Home Space Perfectly !
customer_reviews.text: I have a wired headset from Jabra but I will wanted to have the ability to communicate wirelessly, and this product was a perfect fit, I no longer use my wired headset....The Call quality is good...it only gets dropped if I go to another floor... (which is kind of expected)...Noise cancellation was a good addition but it is not the best though..still works for me as my background noise is mostly minimal. Overall Happy with the purchase ! and finally I had some questions for the seller and they replied promptly for my messages...so you can feel safe with the purchase completely...
customer_reviews.author: karthik TS

customer_reviews.title: Works good in a vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought some other bluetooth headphones for both calls and music and they worked well except while in a car. It is really frustrating to be on a work call and people cannot hear you due to background noise. So I bought these due to the price and positive reviews on voice clarity. I had these for a month and I have had many conversations in the car with the windows down. People were able to hear me clearly without the sound of wind and other background noises bothing them! They are so light and comfortable that I often forget that it is on my ear. It does the job for me!
customer_reviews.author: DeShawn Raimey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with multiple devices if you follow one simple rule
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the bests Bluetooth device I've ever owned. I use it with multiple devices - a desktop PC, a laptop, a tablet and a cell phone. When switching between devices (say desktop to cell phone), disconnect from the desktop before attempting to connect to the cell phone. Sound quality is great, as is the microphone. I use this headset for Zoom and Microsoft Team calls, sometimes for several hours in a single day - battery life has never been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Geek1208

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to have while working from home due to COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: Normally I am in the office most of the time but with current conditions being what they are, I have had to work from home for several months. Being used to having my headset at work, I didn't realize how much of a hassle it was to always have to stay in listening range of my phone as I tend to pace a lot when in the office while on calls. This definitely solved the issue and solved it well. Excellent sound quality and comfort with range throughout my entire house. For my many conference calls, it has proven an absolute life saver! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Noah

customer_reviews.title: Microphone Died in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of the phone calls, but the microphone died within two months. I am able to hear, but the person on the other end is not able to hear me. It is only good for one-way items, like music. The main purpose is defeated, dissatisfied. I thought it had a one-year warranty, so maybe I can get a replacement free of charge? I'm certainly not buying another one for the price if it breaks this soon!
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot everyday and I love it. Not being tied to a wire has been wonderful. I Don’t have to worry about having both ears occupied or a headset hurting my ears after so long. I’ve asked multiple people how i sound On the other end and I am clear. The sound is great and the volume has the potential to go high if you have a soft speaker on the other end or low if you have a loud one. I would recommend this to my teams to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very good Bluetooth headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my wife since she is on the phone and multitasking a lot and couldn't have ordered anything better. very good product for the price and very easy to use and till now no complaints. Great Product and will definitely recommend to anyone looking for a not so expensive Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.author: Dhiraj satish kumar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headset for the office, home or vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for Cisco office phone and laptop Skype video calls. First, the sound quality on my end is great and after dozens of calls no one even knows I’m using it, no change in voice quality on the other end. The ear piece is extremely comfortable. I did experiment with various ear tips until I found the perfect fit for my ear, but that’s to be expected with any in ear set. Pairs with multiple devices and very easy to manage. Great with my IPhone as well. Can’t go wrong with this in my opinion. Great value as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tofoggin

customer_reviews.title: Good headset that I cannot keep.
customer_reviews.text: Headset is being returned due to an annoyance I can't dismiss. When the headset is turned off and you get a phone call normal headsets answer the call when the headset is turned on. This headset answers the call and then speaks all ten digitals of the phone number to you and then allows you to talk to your caller. So the caller has to hear nothing on their end for 5 seconds. I keep my headset off a lot to extend the battery. There is no way to disable this "feature".
customer_reviews.author: Dan Westaburger

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Headset, Wireless Bluetooth Earpiece V4.1Hands-Free Earphones with Noise Cancellation Mic for Driving/Business/Office, Compatible with iPhone and Android(Gray)
product_meta.description: Features: -Excellent Sound Quality Advanced 4X noise canceling microphone technology eliminates background noise for crystal-clear audio and uninterrupted conversations, letting you focus on your work or your call in comfort and style. -Superior Comfort Weights ONLY 0.5 oz., durable and comfortable enough to be worn for hours at a time. Enjoy extended comfort with ergonomic lightweight design and ultimate soft ear gels. -Easy Control Separate power, mute and volume buttons allow easy access and control. Press the centrally located answer/end button to direct incoming calls. Audio prompts alert you about battery level, connection status, mute status and more. -Bluetooth 4.1 Interface Allows you to connect seamlessly with virtually any Bluetooth devices from up to 33 feet away, so you can make hands-free phone calls, stream music, GPS directions and more. -Long battery life 8-10 Hours of Talk Time and up to 7.5 Days on Standby Mode. Allow you to make reliable Bluetooth wireless calls and enjoy stream music&media throughout the day on a single charge. Recharging is simple with the included USB cable. Specification: Bluetooth Version: 4.1 Weight: 0.5 ounces Support: HFP, HSP, A2DP and AVRCP profiles Operating Range: up to 33 feet (accessibility) Battery capacity: 110mAH Talk time: 10 hours Music play time: 8.5 hours Standby time: 180 hours Charging time: about 1.5 hours Package: 1 * Bluetooth Headset 1 * USB Charging Cable 2 * Eargels in the case and 3*Eargels in the small bag 1 * Carrying Case 1 * Owner’s Manual How to contact us: Enter our store"Yotech"that below the button"Add to cart", and find the button"Ask a question", you can contact us easily.
feature_bullets: 【Bluetooth 4.1 technology】 - Provides fast and stable pairing with any iOS and Android smart phones, tablets, laptops, MP3 players from up to 33' Away. It can pair easily with any two Bluetooth devices at once.

【Noise suppression】- built-in HD microphone with advanced CVC6.0 noise reduction technology blocks out disruptive background noise like wind, traffic or crowds, offers crystal clear audio and natural sound, allowing you to enjoy high quality music and clear phone calls wherever.

【Hands-free for calling】 - This Bluetooth headset With mic Supports Siri and Google voice assistant. Easily mute/unmute with the touch of a button. Voice alerts battery level, connection status, mute/unmute status, and even announce the phone number of caller except the caller name. Easy-to-reach buttons let you enjoy real hands-free.

【Comfortable & convenient】 - designed to fit either ear, The retractable ear hook and Flip-boom arm swivels and rotates for a secure fit. It is lightweight and comfortable enough to be worn for hours at a time. Ultimate comfort ear gels are available in 3 different sizes to provide a snug, secure tailored fit. Unique high-end carrying case protects the headset from damaging and losing.

【Great battery life】- With up to 8-10 hours of continuous calls and up to 7.5 days in standby mode, This Bluetooth earpiece lets you make reliable wireless calls throughout the day on a single 1.5 hours quick charge.
